name: Following Me
description:
This is my scariest project ever called: Following Me

WARNING READ THIS BEFORE PLAYING: this game uses your webcam, can create files on your pc and can run in the background so beware!

(webcam only used to add more creepyness)

This game is inspired by "IMSCARED" by Ivan Zanotti's MyMadnessWork

note: this is just a demo

CONTROLS:
F - flashlight
Shift - Sprint
